post:
![](https://stockservers.com/templates/universe/images/logo.png)

StockServers LTD provides hosting in many forms, We are no stranger to the hosting industry and have years of experience behind our belts. Our Germany VPS offer is our welcoming to the LET VPS market. Our servers are located at Hetzner and are powered by Proxmox  using Raid-1 or Raid-10 with ZFS optimization.

---

###Our Offer

- 4 vCPU @3.2Ghz +;
- 2GB DDR3 Dedicated (Free upgrade to 4GB, just pop in support ticket);
- 400GB HDD;
- 32TB Bandwidth on a 1Gbps shared port;
- 1 Ipv4;
- Operating System: Linux;

40% Off reccurring
Normally $8.23/mo with promocode only **$4.94/mo**
https://stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=45&promocode=4GPVJY1STD 

---

###Features

- noVNC from client area
- Comes with OS of your deciding but OS can be changed in client are
- Mount own ISO from client area(open support ticket if ISO not there)
- IP given via DHCP so no need to manually configure
- VPS statistics inside client area
- Basic DDoS Protection

---

All servers are provisioned manually but once provisioned, Please enter on order form if you would like an OS pre installed or just an ISO attached, 


We have very minimal amount of stock of these as its spare space on several servers, Most servers are i7 or E5 CPU, the cores are not dedicated and are fair share so abuse will not be tolerated, No miners, No Tor basically if we get a abuse report or DMCA you will need to get it sorted or we will have to terminate but we do give chance before we terminate.

Any questions just ask and I will give a 24 hour test to select people who want to benchmark but it will have only a shared IP and can only used via noVNC.
